title: LF teammates for casual / maybe serious ranked team
body:
Me and my friend are starting a casual ranked team (might go for serious if we doing good) and we are looking for players who are non toxic and willing to learn as a team.
Preferably looking for player with rank high bronze -- low/mid silver although lower than that doesn't matter as long as you want to improve and accept suggestion from other team members. 

We will try to play 2-3 nights a week depend on how many people online when the ranked team is up so we will need subs as well. Outside of that time we probably will play ranked as 5 or normals decided by vote.
Currently all position are open as we are both flexible about roles and also please tell us your preferable play-style (Aggressive/Passive/Kill Only/Objective Focused).
Anyone can start ranked without us
Voice comm are not necessary for now but we definitely need it to improve our teamwork.

Post below if you want to join or add me (Skrab) and tell us your main and secondary role (or main champs) and when you guys can play. 
Cheers.

replies.body:
I'm b3 looking for a team, i use skype, curse and have used discord, 
I play most day/nights of the week
I'm a passive player and maintaining objectives, but all depends on the team and the play-style of the team
These are my mains going from most comfortable to least, i play all roles but not so much in the mid lane
Support: Thresh, blitz, leona, sona
Adc: Vayne, Draven, Kalista
Top: Irelia, Renekton, Swain,
Jungle: Udyr, Amumu, Vi
Mid: Viktor, Veigar, Syndra
